E-Mail Messages
Date: Saturday, 5/3/1988
Subject: Status of Elwood Jewett
Dear Sir,
Elwood Jewett isn't hitting the ball at all at AA !
He has an AVG of .248, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Sunday, 5/11/1988
Subject: Playing time
I'd like to complain about my playing time, I think
I am a pretty good player, so why am I no
regular in your lineups?

Regards,
Henry Dickison



Date: Friday, 5/16/1988
Subject: Progress of Timothy Douglas
Dear Sir,
Timothy Douglas is doing pretty good at A !
He has an ERA of 3.86, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/19/1988
Subject: Progress of Isidro Osuna
Dear Sir,
Isidro Osuna has nothing more to prove at AA !
He has an ERA of 3.02 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 5/21/1988
Subject: Progress of Marvin Oneill
Dear Sir,
Marvin Oneill has an ERA of 0.42 at A !
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 5/21/1988
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Orville Rodgers



Date: Thursday, 5/22/1988
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Wade Troutman



Date: Thursday, 6/5/1988
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
George Curl



Date: Sunday, 6/15/1988
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Carlton Fields



Date: Tuesday, 6/17/1988

Date: Friday, 6/27/1988
Subject: I am a starter...

Regards,
Joe Cureton
